title: request
description: A JARM hash sample taken from a server.

path.description: The requested HTTP path (without query parameters).

url.description: The reconstructed URL for the request if known.

query.description: The HTTP query string which optionally follows the path.

headers.description: An array of HTTP headers from the request.

body.description: The body of the HTTP request.

response:headers.description: An array of HTTP headers from the response.

session.description: The HTTP session this request was part of.
